name: Deep Dream (BHN Games)
description:
You'll never be alone...

You wake up, you don't know who you are, you don't know where you are and above all you are not alone. The Creatures resulting from the Mutation are there. What happened while you were sleeping?

Deep Dream is a mysterious pixel-art puzzle-platformer game. Discover a ruined secret laboratroy and solve all the secrets.

You will play as the Protagonist to learn more about the Mutation.

Features:

  • Explore a mysteryous and atmospheric pixel-art world;
  • Solve mysterious puzzles;
  • Talk with various NPCs to discover the story of the laboratory;
  • More coming in future!

Support:
